title: The Hash Knife Outfit
description: They are just about as bad and evil as outlaw gangs come. But in the end, they finally go straight. For a good reason: there's only one Hash Knife man left alive. A true legend of Western storytelling, Zane Grey's novels have thrilled generations of readers, and sold over 30 million copies since 1954.A sequel to The Drift Fence.
author: Zane Grey
